title: yadukula nandana
sahitya:
yadukula nandana nODuva bAre lalitAngi


anupallavi

  hadinAlgu jagavannu poreva nIlamEghAngana 


caraNam 1    bigiduTTu kanakAmbara kAnciya dAmana nagumukhada 
shrIdharana agaNita guNanidhi jagava mOhipa krSNana
    caraNam 2    saNNa pongoLalUduta kaNNa sannaya mADuta 
ciNNara oDa kUDuta kuNidu bAhO krSNana
    caraNam 3    mandahAsa mukhAmbuja pondidantha gandha kastUri tilaka 
banda namma purandara viTTala indirEsha yadu nandana nODuva
